name: unassailable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in such a strong position that you cannot be defeated: This win has given the team an unassailable lead. The president looked unassailable with over 60 percent of the vote.
impossible to doubt or argue with: unassailable logic The conclusions were unassailable.
impossible to attack: an unassailable fortress
